sense.gloss: as a test, as an experiment, by way of experiment, by way of trial, tentatively
turn (in line), order of things, sequential order
performance (as opposed to practice), going before an audience or on-air, take
high of the season, height (of summer, etc.), actual event (or celebration, etc.), real deal
penetrative vaginal sex (with a prostitute), unsimulated sex (in an adult movie)
standard item, usual thing, (a) classic, go-to choice, staple, regular fixture, standard procedure, convention
basic item (with stable demand), staple goods
one's turn on stage, screen time, screentime

sdata.j: お↑金↑↓かね↓を↑稼↑↓かせ↓ぎたいならアメリカが↑一番↑↓いちばん↓だ。
sdata.e: America is a lovely place to be, if you are here to earn money.

sdata.j: ↑失礼↑↓しつれい↓に↑振舞↑↓ふるま↓ったりしないのが↑一番↑↓いちばん↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I think it is best not to be impolite.

sdata.j: ↑冬↑↓ふゆ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑一番↑↓いちばん↓↑好↑↓す↓きな↑季節↑↓きせつ↓です。
↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓を↑実現↑↓じつげん↓するのに↑一番↑↓いちばん↓↑良↑↓よ↓いのは↑目↑↓め↓を↑覚↑↓さ↓ますことである。
sdata.e: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.

sdata.j: ↑最後↑↓さいご↓に↑笑↑↓わら↓う↑者↑↓もの↓が↑一番↑↓いちばん↓よく↑笑↑↓わら↓う。
sdata.e: He laughs best who laughs last.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑一番↑↓いちばん↓↑背↑↓せ↓が↑高↑↓たか↓いな。
↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑二↑↓に↓↑番目↑↓ばんめ↓のボタンがとれそうだよ。
sdata.e: Your second button is coming off.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑電話↑↓でんわ↓↑番号↑↓ばんごう↓を↑忘↑↓わす↓れてしまった。
↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑電話↑↓でんわ↓↑番号↑↓ばんごう↓がわかっていたら、↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑電話↑↓でんわ↓をかけたのだが。
sdata.e: Had I known your telephone number, I would have called you.
